# Power

This is a minimal working example of an R package, out of many instances of R packages.
The goal of Power is to perform quick math on numeric data, such as square and cube.

## Installation

You can install the development version of Power like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("liumt1573/powers")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(Power)

square(1)
square(0)
square(7)
square(c(1,2,3))

cube(1)
cube(3)
cube(c(3,6,9))
```
